h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
h2_title: How to Access the Kingdom of Sahali
content: The Boar will actually return to near where you first met him at the Rockrest Flat area of the Fright Cliff. However, instead of sitting on a rock, he’ll now be standing over by the stairs leading to a large door you can’t access yet.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'How to Access the Kingdom of Sahali'.
The content is as follows:
The Boar will actually return to near where you first met him at the Rockrest Flat area of the Fright Cliff. However, instead of sitting on a rock, he’ll now be standing over by the stairs leading to a large door you can’t access yet.
